name: Music_1997.wav
keywords: ['theremin song', 'ambient sounds', 'sound of heartbeat', 'ascending notes', 'no voices', 'no other instruments']
caption: This song features the sound of a theremin. It starts off with the sound of a heartbeat played on the theremin itself. Then four ascending notes are played. There is a kind of continuous pad sound playing in the background. There are no other instruments in this song. There are no voices in this song.
